name: Hypnofire 3D
description:
Hypnofire 3D is a 3D remake of a school project I did to pass a course, it became so popular that the exam papers for the following year featured screenshots of the game, and I figured that that warranted a sequel, so here we are!

---
Hypnofire 3D's a remak aw an auld schuil project A did tae pass a course, it became 'at popular 'at the exam papers fur the follaein year featurt screenshots aw the gemm, an A thocht it's a guid raison tae mak a sequel, sae here we ur!
